message: I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good starting point
I'll accept 350,000, but not 300,000. Meet me in the middle at 325,000?
You can't have it all, Bob! I'll give you 60% if you meet me here
You're getting closer to 50/50, but I want more
I'll give you 475,000, but not 450,000. You're getting close, but I'm not there yet
You're getting closer, Bob! Let's meet at 50/50 or I'll walk away
